item.description:
Situated on 24 acres of woods and meadows in central Massachusetts, Cornerstone Ranch allows riders to savor the colors and smells of New England with a two-hour guided trail ride led by farm owner Sue Connell. From the commanding view afforded by long-legged steeds, riders journey along the meandering trails traversing the ranch, taking in sweeping pastures and dense foliage while receiving instruction on mare-maneuvering basics from the guide and the guide's talking horse. Cornerstone Ranch houses an assortment of safe, tranquil horses fit for riders of any age, experience level, or cowboy-hat fluid capacity. Please note that the weight limit for their trail rides is 260 lbs and is limited to one rider per horse.

This trail ride is approximately two hours long and costs $70 per person (unless you have a Groupon that will cut that price in half to $35.)  Typical trail ride gratuity is 15%. For the Groupon, go to: http://www.groupon.com/deals/cornerstone-ra....

Please go to the Cornerstone website to sign up for the ride. Be sure to look for the 2 hour ride on October 29th at 10:30am. 

Also since we will be finishing around lunch time maybe we can stop in a local restaurant on the way back. Please let me know if you are interested in lunch also and I'll search for a nice restaurant we can go to.
item.name: Horseback Riding
